channel.title: pseudonymity on babble
channel.description: Recent content in pseudonymity on babble

item.title: 008 - The Internet Is Magic
item.description: It’s 3:49pm on a Friday and I’m so tired but I feel like I just want to write a word vomit. It’s like there’s stuff inside my head that' making me tired? I don’t know how that works. It feels like if I just get it out then my mind will be more clear and I’ll be more with it. I’ll have more clarity. Feel lighter in my body. Part of the problem no doubt is that I ate a bunch of pasta for lunch.

item.title: 007 - Pseudonymity
item.description: Pseudonymity is being known under a name different than your given name. When I think about names, and being known under a different name than my “birth name” or “given name” or “state name”, I realize that names are not special. Like, “Matt Roll” is not more special than some name I make up and use to talk to people online. I mean ok, maybe there is a good case at this moment in 2021 why my given name is more special than some name I make up and use to talk to people online.
